content:
Udayon naathhaa, giriseenaa nin sa-
Nnidhiyingkal thulllli; malayum kadalum perum ni-
Nne kanyaka garbhe peri,
Avall garbhiniyaayaashcharya-tthaaltthanne pettaall ninne;
Valuthaakkeedanamavall thannormma.

Kaadeeshanmaar jeevanum raajya-
Tthinumavakaashakkaar; mashihaaye snehichore-
Thinu yogyanmaaraa bhaagyam
Kaathukallaal kettittille, kannukallaal kandittille,
Ille chitthe kalpichittum.

Maamodeesaa - moolam mashihaa than
Rooshmaa kutthappettum than gaathram bhakshichum,
Than raktham paanam cheythor
Thaan moolam jeevan poondi-poozhiyathil ninningeree-
Ttaniyum nal mahimaavinnangki.

1. Maathaa kaadeeshanmaar than praarththhanayaal
Arulladiyaarkkum mrtharaayorkkum punyam.

2. Vaazhvaayu theeraname mariyaaminnormma
Avall praarththhana aathmaakkallkkaayum kotta.

3. Nibiyanmaar shleehanmaar sahadenmaare!
Nyangallkkaayu krpa yaachippeenellaarum.

4. Nin sharanatthaal mrtharaam bhraathrpithrkkall
Melaanandappanineer nee veezhtthanam.

6. Maathaa kaadeeshanmaar than praarththhanayaal
Arulladiyaarkkum punyam mrtharaayorkkum.
Vaayanakkaaran:- “neethimaanmaarude koodaaratthil mahatthvatthinteyum rakshayudeyum shabdam" ennu daaveedu mukhaa ntaram parishuddharoohaa paadi.
